\\ we give 48 quadritangents to the modular curve X0(75) which are sufficient to generate the 2-torsion subgroup of its Jacobian \\


\\ the canonical model of X0(75) used when deriving the scheme of quadritangents is \\

f[1] := x[1]*x[3] - x[2]^2 + x[4]^2 - 4*x[5]^2 ;
f[2] := x[1]*x[4] - x[2]*x[3] + x[2]*x[5] + x[4]*x[5] -3*x[5]^2 ;
f[3] := x[1]*x[5] - x[2]*x[4] - x[3]*x[5] ;

\\ all quadritangents are of the form \\

x[1] = a[1]*x[2] + a[2]*x[3] + a[3]*x[4] + a[4]*x[5]

\\ We give the minimal polynomial f of a[1]  and relations for a[2], a[3], a[4] in terms of a[1] = u, for a root u of f \\

\\ all our quadritangents are defined over the number field descrbed by : \\


k := u^12 + 6*u^11 - 91*u^10 - 90*u^9 + 3370*u^8 - 14834*u^7 + 38281*u^6 - 79946*u^5 + 123730*u^4 - 130890*u^3 + 127789*u^2 - 57586*u + 58381; 



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

f := u^12 + 6*u^11 - 91*u^10 - 90*u^9 + 3370*u^8 - 14834*u^7 + 38281*u^6 - 79946*u^5 + 123730*u^4 - 130890*u^3 + 127789*u^2 - 57586*u + 58381 ;  
a[1]  := u ;
a[2]  := -1/141639721686689040*(1622551063058*u^11 + 12639757545665*u^10 - 124528372282287*u^9 - 365357454364857*u^8   + 4773709008942128*u^7 - 15606572136946403*u^6 + 35791517616953403*u^5  - 70223542383995731*u^4  + 91562316359380564*u^3 - 78677279262041201*u^2 + 77253656939824629*u - 10294852788765071 ) ;
a[3] := -1/ 70819860843344520*( 1302412942954*u^11 + 9339108581185*u^10 - 106104169871511*u^9 - 230508625151001*u^8 + 3990547234584040*u^7 - 15061292130592219*u^6 + 36712870645335075*u^5 - 75233014631294963*u^4 + 105419530746350132*u^3 - 83119161971186305*u^2 + 103496216790983997*u +  19214821033550825);
a[4] := 1/694312361209260*( 28676117706*u^11 + 215479079675*u^10 - 2261103354449*u^9 - 5841824308979*u^8 + 85924080818884*u^7 - 300665335956261*u^6 + 710827335904789*u^5  - 1426044676620497*u^4 + 1931194579467948*u^3 - 1586239619933603*u^2 + 1077745224386903*u - 1301174053351993 );




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

f := u^12 + u^11 + 9*u^10 + 40*u^9 + 125*u^8 + 431*u^7 + 1456*u^6 + 639*u^5 + 3895*u^4  + 1200*u^3 + 2859*u^2 + 9*u + 711 ;

a[1] := u ;
a[2] := 1/ 202093678756440*(31170868775*u^11 + 2980773224*u^10 + 216795559605*u^9 + 957429111941*u^8 + 2624059395016*u^7 + 8123871102031*u^6 + 28621146996425*u^5  - 27997400094900*u^4 + 61774433256743*u^3  - 101497172571957*u^2  - 30299240860572*u - 65505228496371) ;
a[3] := 1/67364559585480*(40087728559*u^11 + 58541592208*u^10 + 327286175019*u^9 + 1687350552805*u^8 +  5438483245694*u^7 + 17603054304743*u^6 + 59289585628945*u^5  + 32117274981912*u^4 + 99073013306845*u^3   + 109752651751827*u^2 +  39338993277258*u  + 23930256987153 ) ;
 a[4] :=  -1/202093678756440*(459044962673*u^11 + 126506149952*u^10 + 3740752976877*u^9 + 15714131893187*u^8 + 44107882097254*u^7 + 157655613428317*u^6 + 533596098579095*u^5 - 148827339389304*u^4 + 1646864492918651*u^3 - 259720034066643*u^2  +  723559950639474*u - 262869802509213 ) ;



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

f :=  u^12 - 2*u^11 + 21*u^10 - 50*u^9 + 130*u^8 - 1002*u^7 + 2169*u^6 - 7362*u^5 + 16650*u^4   - 21330*u^3   + 50301*u^2  - 22842*u + 53541 ;

a[1] := u ;
a[2] :=  -1/989352072720*( 31780654*u^11 + 35184793*u^10 + 487829205*u^9 + 92792059*u^8 - 174066092*u^7  - 24459595611*u^6   - 20346101625*u^5 - 64385877375*u^4 + 113713491096*u^3 +  646293110247*u^2 + 738498973977*u  + 1579202221077 );
a[3] :=   1/14990182920*(1112348*u^11 - 2828753*u^10 + 18039343*u^9 - 67448645*u^8 + 66156922*u^7   - 1115875817*u^6  + 2484057557*u^5 - 4549266183*u^4 + 18404993250*u^3 - 11014499547*u^2   + 28019583279*u  - 27505059759 ) ;
a[4] :=  -1/ 247338018180*(2463415*u^11 - 64266821*u^10 + 53734557*u^9 - 1159298672*u^8 + 1178622259*u^7 - 6182153175*u^6   + 51160000503*u^5 - 42869953332*u^4 + 246825643077*u^3 - 504885797649*u^2 + 340411655295*u   - 748758560202) ;   



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------   
   
f := u^12 - 2*u^11 + 21*u^10 + 30*u^9 + 250*u^8 + 238*u^7 + 1369*u^6 - 602*u^5 + 5770*u^4 - 8250*u^3 + 12261*u^2 - 20042*u + 10981 ;  
a[1]  := u ;
a[2] :=  -1/157202076240*(9745328*u^11 - 17139225*u^10 + 239277331*u^9 + 279059519*u^8 + 3183501206*u^7 + 4859289751*u^6  + 22254727097*u^5 + 6337541909*u^4 + 96208059166*u^3  - 57723043371*u^2 + 236633195771*u  - 316718987547);
a[3] :=  1/39300519060*(9668974*u^11 - 686748*u^10 + 164436374*u^9 + 675526051*u^8 + 3075298126*u^7 + 6622159106*u^6   + 18558678826*u^5 + 21591154141*u^4 + 58285309094*u^3 + 31275315354*u^2 + 31646937670*u   - 55390969533);
a[4] :=  -1/78601038120*(21427516*u^11 - 49380907*u^10 + 464907767*u^9 + 612594113*u^8 + 4957582866*u^7 + 5885083309*u^6 + 32453017757*u^5 + 3744433923*u^4 + 133521145042*u^3 - 127267891241*u^2 + 208754169895*u - 157211951845);
